slides.title: AI Sales Setup

content.headline: Let AI Handle Initial Customer Conversations

slides.narration: In the next twenty minutes, you'll set up an AI assistant that handles initial customer conversations twenty-four seven. It answers instantly, qualifies leads, and hands off to you when a human is needed. Let's build your always-on sales team.

slides.title: What AI Sales Can Do
slides.narration: Here's what your AI sales assistant can handle. Answer common questions—hours, pricing, availability. Qualify leads—understand their budget, timeline, and needs. Schedule appointments—directly connecting to your calendar. Provide information—about your services, products, and process. And hand off to humans—when questions get complex or someone's ready to buy. You handle the relationships. AI handles the volume.

slides.title: Step 1: Enable AI Sales

content.headline: Step 1: Turn On AI Sales Assistant
initial_setup: Choose your AI personality (Professional, Friendly, or Custom)
content.note: AI starts with basic capabilities; we'll customize next

slides.narration: Step one: Enable your AI Sales Assistant. Go to Dashboard, AI, Sales Assistant, and click Enable. Toggle the assistant to on. Select response speed—instant is recommended, but you can add a delay if preferred. Choose your AI personality—professional, friendly, or custom. The AI starts with basic capabilities. We'll customize it for your business next.

slides.title: Step 2: Train on Your Business

content.headline: Step 2: Teach AI About Your Business
content.tip: The more you teach it, the better it performs

slides.narration: Step two: Train the AI on your business. It needs to know what you know. First, let it scan your website—this happens automatically. Then upload your FAQ document if you have one. Add your service descriptions—import or add manually. Include pricing information—at least ranges if not exact prices. The more you teach it, the better it performs. Don't worry about perfection—you can refine later.

slides.title: Step 3: Set Qualification Questions

content.headline: Step 3: Define Lead Qualification

qualification_questions.question: What service are you interested in?
What's the best way to reach you?

content.customization: Add questions specific to your business
content.scoring: Optionally set up lead scoring based on answers

slides.narration: Step three: Set your qualification questions. These help AI understand who's a good fit. Basic questions: What service are they interested in? What's their timeline? What's their approximate budget? Best way to reach them? Add questions specific to your business. You can also set up lead scoring—automatically ranking leads based on their answers so you prioritize the best ones.

slides.title: Step 4: Configure Handoffs

content.headline: Step 4: When Does AI Hand Off to You?
content.notification_options: Email, SMS, App notification, or all three

slides.narration: Step four: Configure when AI hands off to you. Ready-to-buy signals—AI recognizes these and notifies you immediately. Complex questions AI can't answer—it escalates instead of guessing. Customer requests human—instant transfer, no questions asked. High-value lead detected—priority notification. Choose how you want to be notified: email, SMS, app notification, or all three. You stay in control of what matters.

slides.title: Step 5: Test and Refine

content.headline: Step 5: Test Your AI Assistant
content.refinement: Review conversations weekly; add training as needed
content.tip: AI improves over time as it learns from real conversations

slides.narration: Step five: Test and refine. Before going live, test your AI. Ask common questions—does it answer correctly? Ask edge cases—does it handle gracefully or escalate? Request a human—does it hand off properly? Complete a full qualification flow—does it capture information correctly? After launch, review conversations weekly. Add training as needed. AI improves over time as it learns from real conversations.

slides.title: Activate AI Sales

content.headline: Ready for 24/7 Sales Coverage?
content.summary: Enable → Train → Qualify → Handoff → Go Live
content.result: Never miss another inquiry. Even at 3am.

slides.narration: Ready for twenty-four seven sales coverage? Enable, train, set qualification, configure handoffs, go live. Click 'Set Up AI Sales' to start now, or watch a demo first if you want to see it in action. The result: you'll never miss another inquiry, even at three in the morning. Your AI sales assistant is ready.
